resources.string:
Hello everyone, Cyrille here, I'm an indie developer originally from France.

As I learn Chinese, I realized I needed such app and none of the existing ones filled my needs.

So here we are, I'm happily sharing for free this creation with you.

If you also find it useful, please consider participating to my croissant fund, or review it for free!

Reviews, feedback, encouragement help tremendously!
